ygData.subject: Re: ARDUNE IS NOT A GM
ygData.msgSnippet: actually Ardune (spelling?) is not a GM.  why everyone thinks he is i don t know.  is his name green? NO.  does he have GM only items? NO!  he is played by the
ygData.messageBody:
actually Ardune (spelling?) is not a GM. why everyone thinks he is i don't know. is his name
green? NO. does he have GM only items? NO! he is played by the lead programer Brad McQuade or
however u spell his last name, hehe. but Ardune is not a GM. he is just Brad's character in game.

Tim West wrote:

> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
> Yes, he is a GM. In fact this character is used by Brad McQuaid (spelling)
> who is the head programmer for the game. That is why his ranger can use
> the sword. Check out the picture of him at the Fires Of Heaven website
> under "The Killing Of Lady Vox".
>
> Tanaman
>
